mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM sermonboard WHERE sermonboardCnt IS NOT NULL
AND sermonSubject like CONCAT('%', #{sermonSearchParam},'%')
AND sermonTitle like CONCAT('%', #{sermonSearchParam} , '%')
AND sermonMain like CONCAT('%', #{sermonSearchParam} ,'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE sermonboard SET sermonSubject = #{sermonSubject}, sermonTitle = #{sermonTitle}, sermonMain = #{sermonMain}, sermonPage=#{sermonPage}, sermonPoint=#{sermonPoint}, sermonFile=#{sermonFile}, sermonDate=#{sermonDate}, sermonBibleType=#{sermonBibleType} WHERE sermonboardCnt = #{sermonCnt}
UPDATE member SET point = point - #{point} WHERE duplicateid = #{duplicateid}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ganghaesermonboard WHERE sermonboardCnt IS NOT NULL
AND sermonSubject like CONCAT('%',#{sermonSearchParam},'%')
AND sermonTitle like CONCAT('%', #{sermonSearchParam} ,'%')
AND sermonMain like CONCAT('%', #{sermonSearchParam} ,'%')
AND sermonBibleType IS NOT NULL
AND sermonBibleType = '구약'
AND sermonBibleType = '신약'
mapper.update: UPDATE ganghaesermonboard SET sermonSubject = #{sermonSubject}, sermonTitle = #{sermonTitle}, sermonMain = #{sermonMain}, sermonPage=#{sermonPage}, sermonPoint=#{sermonPoint}, sermonFile=#{sermonFile}, sermonDate=#{sermonDate}, sermonBibleType=#{sermonBibleType} WHERE sermonboardCnt = #{sermonCnt}
